name: Finding Alex
description:
May contain creepy dialogue. Zoe just came back home after a year of boarding school. However, his best friend is missing… Please help Zoe figure out what is happening through this puzzle game.

Guide:

  • Press 【Space】to Interact with surroundings.
  • Use 【AWSD】 to control the player.
  • Press 【E】 to open/close backpack
  • Press 【H】 at the title screen to see info about credits and developers
